LanguageData.AP_OccupiedBy: Prefab can't be built. {0} is blocking construction.
LanguageData.AP_ImpassableTerrain: Prefab can't be built. Impassable terrain, "{0}" is blocking construction.
LanguageData.AP_GeyserAt: Prefab can't be built over a steam geyser
LanguageData.AP_ImpassableTerrainDeploy: Can't deploy prefab on impassable terrain: "{0}"
LanguageData.AP_NeedsDeployment: This prefab needs to be deployed by a colonist
LanguageData.AP_ResearchNotFinished: Research "{0}" needs to be finished before being able to buy this prefab
LanguageData.AP_NotAllModsPresent: This prefab is lacking one or more mods needed to buy it
LanguageData.AP_NotEnoughMoney: Not enough silver. You need at least {0} silver around valid trade beacons to buy this prefab
LanguageData.AP_TotalPrefabValue: Total prefab value estimated at {0} simoleons
LanguageData.AP_PrefabLockingResearches: This prefab requires the following researches: {0}
LanguageData.AP_PrefabMods: This prefab requires the following mods: {0}
LanguageData.AP_BuildPrefabDesc: Build the prefab structure contained inside this builder. The prefab won't be built if there are already buildings or impassable terrain in the indicated area.
LanguageData.AP_UndeployPrefabDesc: Cancels prefab deployment, transforming the prefab builder into an item that can be again moved.
LanguageData.AP_OpenPrefabCatalog: Open a catalog to browse all available prefabs. To buy prefabs you'll need a trading beacon with silver on its effect radius.
